name: Sanjuro's Street Fight
description:
Made for Movie Game Jam.

Based on this scene from Yojimbo (1961).

Controls:

From menu:   Z / X / C - Start Game

Z - Dash,    X - Slice,    C - Throw,    Arrow keys - Move

Art by Beau: twitter.com/midoripantsu
Programming by Jeff: twitter.com/1inchboy

Thanks for playing :)
